mapper.select: SELECT r_no, b_no, r.g_no, m_no, r_content, r_writetime, r_delete, r_good, r.g_no, g_name, g_id FROM reply r join guest g on g.g_no=r.g_no where b_no=#{bNo} order by r_no desc limit 0,5;

select r_no, b_no, r.g_no, m_no, r_content, r_writetime, r_delete, r_good, r.g_no, g_name, g_id from reply r join guest g on g.g_no = r.g_no where b_no = #{bNo} order by r_no desc limit #{cri.pageStart},#{cri.perPageNum}

select r.r_no, r.b_no, b.b_title, r.r_writetime, r.g_no, g.g_id, g.g_image, r.r_read, 'r' r_content from reply r join board b on r.b_no = b.b_no join guest g on r.g_no = g.g_no where r.g_no=#{gNo} union select l.l_no, l.b_no, b.b_title, l.l_date, l.g_no, g.g_id, g.g_image, l.l_read, 'l' r_content from `like` l join board b on l.b_no = b.b_no join guest g on l.g_no = g.g_no where l.g_no=#{gNo} order by r_writetime desc, r_no desc limit #{cri.pageStart},#{cri.perPageNum};
